form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/31/2023 FORM APPROVED O.M.B. No. 1405-0015 OPTI L FORM 230 (English) (Rev. 6-82) DEP STATE APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION 50230 s INSTRUCTIONS: This form must be completed by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. All questions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on separate sheets, using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa is 125.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be grounds for your prosecution and/or deportation. 1. Family name First name Middle name PATEL GOVANBHAI KHUSHALBHAI 2. Other names used or by which known (If married woman, give maiden name) NONE 3. Full name in native alphabet (If Roman letters not used) 4261 Silgames 4. Date of birth 5. Age 6. Place of birth (Day) (Month) (Year) 85 (City or town) (Province) (Country) 19 SEP 1904 YEARS. ENA GUJARAT INDIA 7. Nationality 8. Sex 9. Marital status INDIAN Male Female Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated Including my present marriage, I have been married TWO times. 10. Occupation 11. Present address AGRICULTURIST JAGIRDAR ST; ENA, TAL: PALSANA, DIST: SURAT, GUJARAT 399 310, (INDIA). 12. Name, address, date and place of birth of wife/husband Give maiden name of wife) PATEL GANGABEN PARSHOTAMBHAI, AT & POST: ENA, (JAGIRDAR ST;), TAL: PALSANA, DIST: SURAT, GUJARAT 399 310, (INDIA), 02 MAY 1920. DHATWA, INDIA Date and place of marriage 10 FEB 1947, BALE SHWAR, INDIA, From 13. Names, addresses, dates and places of birth of all children istwife (01) MRS. KAMUBEN PISAD, INDIA 23 JUL 33, BALESHWAR, INDIA expired (02) NATVERBHAI (MR.) ENA, INDIA 31 JUL 37, ENA, INDIA (03) From (04) 2nd wife (05) (06) FOIA (b)(6) (07) 14. Person(s) named in 12 and 13 who will accompany or follow 15. Final address in the United States me to the United States PERSONS NAMED IN 12 WILL MAMK ACCOMPANY & 13 WILL FOLLOW ME 4070 MARKET ST; TO THE U.S. EXCEPT FOIA (b)(6) HANNIBAL, WHO IS ALREADY SETTLED IN THE U.S. MO. 63401, (U.S.A.). 16. Person you intend to inin /Give name. address. and relationship, 17. Name and address of sponsoring person or organization (If if any) different from 16) SAME AS 16 FOIA (b)(6) 18. Personal description 19. Marks of identification (a) Color of hair (c) Height WHITE /BLACK 5 feet 5 inches NONE (b) Color of eyes (d) Complexion 20. Purpose in going to the United States BLACK FAIR SETTLEMENT 21. Length of intended stay (If permanently, so state) 22. Intended port of entry 23. Do you have a ticket to final destination? PERMANENTLY NEW YORK NO THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA NSN 7540-00-149-0919 Previous edition not usable
